CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1941, pg. 8 reads: "When Lilas King and Clarence Morton married last week it was a happy occasion. Here are pictured the bridal party and some friends...Miss Gertie Mae Hawks of New York, Mrs. Blanche Osborne, W.R. King, father of the bride; Mrs. King, mother of the bride and the newlyweds.- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Gertie Mae Hawks, Blanche Osborne, W. R. King, Mrs. King, bride Lilas King Morton, and Groom Clarence Morton, in King home
